changeSet.author: jhipster
changeSet.createView:
SELECT shelf.id, emodle.equipment_type,emodle.id as equipment_type_id, e.equipment_code,e.id as equipment_id, a.area_code,a.id as area_id, shelf.support_rack_code as shelves_code,shelf.id as shelves_id,shelfType.support_rack_type_code as shelves_type ,shelfType.id as shelves_type_id, p.project_code ,p.project_name,shelf.status, e.equipment_code||'.'|| a.area_code||'.'||shelf.support_rack_code as position,shelf.memo, (select count(b.id) from frozen_box b where b.equipment_id = temp.equipment_id and b.area_id = temp.area_id and b.support_rack_id = temp.support_rack_id and b.status = '2004') as count_of_used, (shelfType.support_rack_rows*shelfType.support_rack_columns-(select count(b.id) from frozen_box b where b.equipment_id = temp.equipment_id and b.area_id = temp.area_id and b.support_rack_id = temp.support_rack_id and b.status = '2004')) as count_of_rest
FROM ( select box.project_id,box.equipment_id,box.area_id,box.support_rack_id from frozen_box box where box.status = '2004' group by box.project_id,box.equipment_id,box.area_id,box.support_rack_id )temp
LEFT JOIN support_rack shelf ON temp.support_rack_id = shelf.id LEFT JOIN support_rack_type shelfType ON shelf.support_rack_type_id = shelfType.id LEFT JOIN area a ON temp.area_id = a.id LEFT JOIN equipment e ON temp.equipment_id = e.id LEFT JOIN equipment_modle emodle ON e.equipment_modle_id = emodle.id LEFT JOIN project p ON temp.project_id = p.id
